text: Pohiva Tu’i’onetoa (30 June 1951 -- 18 March 2023 ) was a Tongan accountant and politician. He was the 17th Prime Minister of Tonga from 2019 to 2021. Tu'i'onetoa replaced Semisi Sika, who was acting prime minister, since the death of ʻAkilisi Pōhiva. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Tonga
title: Pohiva Tuʻiʻonetoa
